nodes.text: Brentaal Trade News was a commercial and business NewsNet that was based on Brentaal. SoroSuub executive Dien Suub read the front page of it every morning.

Although Brentaal Trade News was not officially part of Imperial HoloVision, it nonetheless was required to publish any stories that paint the Galactic Empire in a positive light as well as spreading only loyal sentiment, with the threat of punishment if they fail to do so.
On 37:2:23 GrS, Brentaal Trade News reported on an Imperial Customs raid on a warehouse complex in Votrad that seized tons of raw materials set to be smuggled into the Outer Rim Territories.
